items.title: The FuboTV-Hulu deal was good for investors. There’s a silver lining for viewers too.
items.description: Live-TV streaming offerings are still far cheaper than cable and there may be more affordable bundles.

items.title: Oil prices struggle for direction as U.S. crude supplies fall and product stocks rise

items.title: U.S. Crude Oil Stockpiles Extend Decline to Seven Weeks
items.description: U.S. crude oil inventories fell for a seventh consecutive week, while product stocks saw large builds last week as refineries increased their capacity...

items.title: Why a 5% 10-year Treasury yield could be a buying opportunity

items.title: Will the stock market be open tomorrow? As Jimmy Carter is laid to rest, the U.S. will observe a National Day of Mourning.
items.description: The U.S. will honor former President Jimmy Carter, who died on Dec. 29 at age 100, with an official state funeral on Thursday, Jan. 9.
